__e: I'm old. Maybe you think I'm weak. And blind too, like Samson, eh?
So, he's dead and she's blind.
Said she hadn't counted on no honest-to - Jesus blind man... and she run off to catch up with her daddy.
Suppose you are blind, that doesn't mean you always will be.
I know she's blind, but I'm not!
As you can see, I may be blind, but I do have an eye for gambling.
No, I'm just your average blind man.
"Don't think it isn't clear to anyone with half an eye, except your blind husband."
I was dull indeed not to see it's possibilities.
You're as blind in your way as the others are in theirs.
“None so blind as those who will not see.”
Get this: He's not even blind!
Yeah, but he'll be blind for the rest of his life. Poor guy.
She'll never see again, thanks to you.
It is blind. Because of people like you, pal.
There's something wrong with its eyes. It's blind.
Blind as she is, she wants to go to the village!
There's something wrong with its eyes. It's blind.
Is that mother of yours blind, or has she decided to sell you by the pound?
